featured.text: They cannot find a safe shelter when climbing out of the trenches.
Instead, like a human fly, George Willig climbed the outside of the immense 110-story building.
Instead, he would be fined a penny for each of the 110 floors he had climbed.
They canoed down rivers, hiked along muddy trails, and climbed into the forest to explore and learn.
It's like climbing Mount Everest—it's something you have to do.

other.text: But Brahma thought 24 would do because he believed humans would dig into the earth and climb every mountain, and eventually find it.

definition.zh_def: 攀爬，向上移動或上升的行為。
definition.en_def: To go up or ascend, especially by using the hands and feet.
definition.example: We decided to climb the mountain early in the morning.
